name: Portal of Bats
description:
Portal of Bats

Once a year, the portals open and the relics must be protected. You are the chosen one. Defend the relics from the evil lord's minions.

Movement: WASD
Left Mouse Click: Fireball
Right Mouse Click: Water Blast

This game was made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #18.  Theme: 'Bats'

It is my first "complete" game, after practicing with some tutorials. And with that this was also my first Game Jam!

All the "artwork", sound effects, "music" and code have been made by me in the Game Jam period. It was a lot of fun and I wish I had more time for polishing and debugging.

Have fun!
